timeline.bodyText: I do not quite understand the reasoning behind this class. connectionObserver and handshakeObserver references are temporary, i.e. they can only be retrieved once which makes the contract very error prone and not very different than the connection attribute approach. My hope was that we can be explicit in contract while passing these objects between classes, can we try doing that?
